data.title: B Site Lockdown
data.description: A good Lockdown to get onto B Site and push the defenders off allowing you to take the site way easier.

data.title: Outside A Short To Front Truck Post Plant Nanoswarm
data.description: This nanoswarm is perfect for playing a truck post plant passively, throw it right away and wait to hear the defusal sound before activating for an easy round win.

data.title: Outside Showers To A Default Post Plant Nanoswarm
data.description: This nanoswarm is perfect for passively defending a A Site post plant, throw it early and wait for the defusal sound prior to activating for an easy round win.
